readText

public static JsonString readText(JsonSystem system,
                                  java.io.BufferedReader reader)
                           throws java.io.IOException
Read the given BufferedReader as text into a JsonString. Line endings will be regularized to "\n".

Parameters:
system - The associated JsonSystem.
reader - The BufferedReader to read.
Returns:
A new JsonString.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
